2. Shawn Teamann, Mayor

Shawn C. Teamann, Mayor
=======================

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| The Honorable Shawn C. Teamann  Resigned as Council:  May 17, 2024   Last Elected:  November 4, 2024   Term Expires:  November 2, 2027  Shawn Teamann has lived in the Texoma area since 1982. He attends church at Western Heights Church of Christ in Sherman, Tx with his wife of 14 years and the couple's two children. Shawn has been an owner and respected business leader at Nautilus Family Fitness for more than 22 years.  Shawn serves as president of the board for several for-profit businesses. Shawn served 8 years on the Sherman City Council, and he is currently Mayor of Sherman. He is a board member for the Grayson County Metropolitan Planning Organization, an ex-officio board member of the Sherman Economic Development Corporation, board member of Texoma Area Solid Waste Authority, past board member of the Sherman Chamber of Commerce, and he has held board positions with several area non-profits.  The Mayor presides at the meetings of the Council and is recognized as head of the City government for all ceremonial purposes, and by the Governor for purposes of military law, but has no regular administrative duties. The Mayor is entitled to vote upon all matters considered by the Council, but he does not make or second motions. | ![Shawn Teamann 2024](https://www.ci.sherman.tx.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=12773) |
